verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: is] serving rack of lamb and nectarine tart at Tuesday ’s White House state dinner for President Emmanuel Macron of France .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] is [V: serving] [ARG1: rack of lamb and nectarine tart] [ARGM-LOC: at Tuesday ’s White House state dinner for President Emmanuel Macron of France] .
